headline: Nucor (NUE) Is The Only One That Can Provide Steel At Scale For Data Centers, Says Jim Cramer

Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) is one of the largest steel companies in America. Cramer has frequently discussed the firm in 2025, and most of his comments have surrounded Chinese […]

headline: Caterpillar (CAT)’s “Levered” To The Data Center, Says Jim Cramer
